data.title: Pretty Good!
data.text: I love this place. Delicious cheese quesadilla. Easy, quick, and delicious for on the go. Reasonable prices, too.

data.title: Fantastic Food
data.text: Found this little gem during our visit and attending the National Square Dance convention, ate there every day once we found.  Fresh market foods, and friendly place to eat, small but wonderful.  The owner Michelle was sweet as can be!  I will miss het

data.title: Great place for lunch and socializing!
data.text:
This family-owned little cafe, spotlessly kept up and full of great unusual Middle Eastern treats as well as American favorities, replaces the very crowded Starbucks for us.

We've been there often between meetings in Springfield. It's a great place to watch the city goings-on from their spacious windows and sip some really great drinks.  The chai is original chai and tastes unlike the kind anyone can make from a mix.  Same with the lattes.  They're powerful and rich.

The service is very good considering the traffic they see, and very tailored to your personal needs.  They'll remember you most likely, and go out of their way to please.

I'm a huge fan of real hummus, and this place has it.  You can get it in a wrap with fresh veggies, or with pita.  Made like it's made in the place they invented it; slightly spicy, lemony, with real tahini.

My husband's a fan of American food and goes for cheese and veggies on a wrap - he can get just the veggies he wants, always fresh and tasty.

Lots of great baked goods, from pound cakes and muffins to baklava fill the shelves, but they're popular, so if you go late, you might miss out. 

This is a popular place with regulars, but out-of-towners will find it a refreshing change from chain food.

data.title: Just what I was lookin' for!  (Yes it is open)
data.text: I desperately was in need of a quick coffee and a bagel before an early basketball game at the Mass. Mutual Center and right around the corner from the parking garage I found exactly what I wanted.  Excellent coffee and a quality bagel, toasted to perfection with Philadelphia cream cheese.  Many such places, incl. DD will rush you a warm bagel, no sign of being toasted!  They also sell a lengthy list of freshly ground coffee to take home, but we are a Kuerig household. Very personable owner as well.

data.title: Cozy Place Great Service
data.text: Fatima and her family are so welcoming.  The coffee and food is always good.  They also make authentic Lebanese Cuisine and it is different every day.  Prices are great and I love going here for a quick bite and a coffee.

data.title: Average Coffee
data.text: Not known for food, this is a coffee shop on Main Street near the Mass Mutual Center.  Once sold coffee beans by the pound, and they might still do but the original owner had a passion for beans that I find lacking now.

data.title: Coffee and Tea
data.text: Nice little place for a cup of coffee; food selections are very limited

data.title: Wonderful PitStop
data.text:
This little place is just fabulous for a monring drink or afternoon refreshment! Great coffee and homemade treats, with a veggie-laden selection of healthy lunch bites. 

Exquisitely clean, and offers a great view of the business district of Springfield. Owners are friendly and very service-orineted.  Know your preferences right away and make your visit great. 

Their smoothies are a wonderful dessert.
